featured.text: Besides, soybeans can be fed to a variety of other animals ranging from livestock to silk worms.

definition.zh_def: 蠕蟲，一種柔軟且無骨的無脊椎動物，通常生活在土壤或水中。
definition.en_def: A worm is a soft-bodied, unsegmented invertebrate animal that typically lives in soil or water.
definition.example: The gardener found a worm while digging in the soil.
